column1: Madipakkam is residential locality situated in south of Chennai
column2: India. It has been recently placed under the Greater Chennai Corporation.

column3: 940. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Madipakkam has an average literacy rate of 88%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 90%
column5: and female literacy is 85%. In Madipakkam
column6: 9% of the population are under 6 years of age.
